# The slum theme for blogdown

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
glimpse(mpg)
ggplot(mpg, aes(displ, hwy)) + 
  geom_point() + 
  theme_dark() 
```

All pages not under the root directory of the website are listed below. You can also visit the list page of a single section, e.g., [posts](/post/), or [projects](/project/). See the [about](/about/) page for more detail.
